# 前端代码是怎样智能生成的

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/qianduan-daima-shi-zenyang-zhineng-shengcheng-de
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/qianduan-daima-shi-zenyang-zhineng-shengcheng-de
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install qianduan-daima-shi-zenyang-zhineng-shengcheng-de
qianduan-daima-shi-zenyang-zhineng-shengcheng-de <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g qianduan-daima-shi-zenyang-zhineng-shengcheng-de
qianduan-daima-shi-zenyang-zhineng-shengcheng-de <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
